blogPost.excerpt: Unleash the power of AI to generate 100% original content that reads like it was written by a human - and do it in seconds. No more copy & paste. No more spinning.
blogPost.body: Unleash the power of AI to generate 100% original content that reads like it was written by a human - and do it in seconds. No more copy & paste. No more spinning.
blogPost.title: AI Article Writer - Generate articles and blog posts in seconds with AI
blogPost.author: Samanyou Garg

localize.description: 释放人工智能的力量，生成100%的原创内容，读起来就像人类写的一样--而且只需几秒钟。没有更多的复制和粘贴。没有更多的旋转。
localize.tagline: 用AI在几秒钟内生成文章和博客文章。

localize.description: 釋放人工智能的力量，生成100%的原創內容，讀起來就像人類寫的一樣--而且只需幾秒鐘。沒有更多的複製和粘貼。沒有更多的旋轉。
localize.tagline: 用AI在幾秒鐘內生成文章和博客文章。

previous.excerpt: Linguix keyboard makes your writing clear, smooth, and correct in all your favorite apps!
previous.title: Linguix Keyboard - Check grammar instantly in real-time in your favorite apps

localize.description: Linguix 键盘让您在所有喜爱的应用程序中都能清晰、流畅、正确地书写。
localize.tagline: 在您喜爱的应用程序中实时检查语法。

localize.description: Linguix 鍵盤讓您在所有喜愛的應用程序中都能清晰、流暢、正確地書寫。
localize.tagline: 在您喜愛的應用程序中實時檢查語法。

next.excerpt: Instantly and magically create image assets from ordinary screenshots! 🤯 Screenstab eliminates time, cost and effort by auto-generating high-quality graphics for marketing materials, social media posts, illustrations, presentation slides, and more!
next.title: Screenstab - Turn plain screenshots into dazzling image assets

localize.description: 瞬间从普通的屏幕截图中神奇地创建图像资产! 🤯 Screenstab通过自动生成高质量的图形，用于营销材料、社交媒体帖子、插图、演示文稿幻灯片等，消除了时间、成本和精力。
localize.tagline: 将普通的屏幕截图变成令人眼花缭乱的图像资产。

localize.description: 瞬間從普通的屏幕截圖中神奇地創建圖像資產! 🤯 Screenstab通過自動生成高質量的圖形，用於營銷材料、社交媒體帖子、插圖、演示文稿幻燈片等，消除了時間、成本和精力。
localize.tagline: 將普通的屏幕截圖變成令人眼花繚亂的圖像資產。
